Those are tables organized in relational database (RDBMS) style. You can either get the copy in sqlite format from the [http://code.google.com/p/rhymedict/downloads/list download_page], or browse them online at google's fusion tables lab:

[http://www.google.com/fusiontables/DataSource?dsrcid=199105 韻母]

[http://www.google.com/fusiontables/DataSource?dsrcid=198330 辭條]
